DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label , randomized Phase II study previously untreated patient metastatic breast cancer evaluate antitumor activity safety weekly dose-dense ABI-007 ( Abraxane ) compare 2-weekly regimen vs standard 3-weekly infusion . All patient also receive concurrent bevacizumab .
